ENUM_0.message: Hello there!
Oh no!
Well, this isn't exactly what I would call a vacation.
Could you help me out, please?
Don't leave me.
I hate space.
Am I upside down?
I hope I can float my way to a bathroom...
WHY DID YOU LET ME GO??
Oh no, not again!
Captain...
Yolo
Marco?
Polo?
Am I supposed to feel connected right now?
If I don't come back, tell my wife "Hello."
If a tree falls in space can you hear it?
If a tree falls in space...how the hell did it get there?
Can we talk for a moment?
Whatever you do... DON'T LET GO!

ENUM_1.message: Cap'n, we can jump in SPACE.. We'll have to... jump into the sun.

ENUM_2.message: This is the perfect SPACE to use a jet pack
You can use your jet pack in SPACE to get to the sun

ENUM_4.message: Captain, how could you do this to me?
